local_intent: Execute contact-guided placement on red_plate: detect plate, move above, lower until contact, verify contact, place, release, and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is currently held in the gripper (grasp_white_plate available)
Safe approach heights and collision models are valid
Perception can reacquire red_plate if initial detection fails
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'place' phase in GLOBAL_BT: perception of red_plate, above-table approach, controlled descent until contact, contact verification, placement with small press, release, and retreat consistent with GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION.
